description: Lists the account IDs that have access to the specified portfolio. A delegated admin can list the accounts that have access to the shared portfolio. Note that if a delegated admin is de-registered, they can no longer perform this operation.

parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: The language code. jp - Japanese zh - Chinese.

nested_items.name: AccountIds
nested_items.description: Information about the Amazon Web Services accounts with access to the portfolio.

nested_items.name: NextPageToken
nested_items.description: The page token to use to retrieve the next set of results. If there are no additional results, this value is null.
